welcome.title: Welcome to the Web Gallery
welcome.subtitle: Presentation:
welcome.paragraph: This gallery aims at allowing its users to browse and enjoy a complete picture library via a simple web page, and thus allow them to always have their picture with them.
welcome.subtitle: Instructions:
welcome.paragraph: In order to view the pictures, you need to select a directory using the navigation box, on the left side of this page. Once the directory is selected, the thumbnails of the pictures available in this directory are displayed. A click on any thumbnail will show the picture.
welcome.title: Have a good visit!
